channel.title: [EarthScape Source]How to make ::message?
channel.description:
On a Runescape server i played..it had ::message which is like ::yell but shows [SERVER] in front of it..
If anyone can gimme the command stuff for it, that'd me great..
Thanks, ~Vamp256[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2009, 08:04:38 pm[/size][hr]The server its is is deltascape source & is called misthalin.

item.title: [EarthScape Source]How to make ::message?
item.dc:creator: @Noobiex Noobiex
item.description:
@Noobiex wrote:

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[MESSAGE]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
